msg-no-account: You have no account? Then sign in
msg-pw-requirements: Your password should at least be 8 characters long and should contain at least one lower-case letter, one upper-case letter, one digit and one special character.
msg-text-missing: Please fill in the form completely!
msg-have-account: You already have an account? Then log in
msg-equal-pw-confirm: The password and its confirmation must be equal.
